text: [Duzaxijon] Dar on [otas] farjod mezanand: «Parvardigoro, moro [az in azoʙ] ʙerun ovar, to ƣajr az on ci [pestar] mekardem, kori soistae ancom dihem». [Ba onon gufta mesavad] «Ojo ʙa sumo [on qadar fursat va] umr nadodem, to har ki pandpazir ast, dar on [muddat] pand girad? Va [pajomʙar niz ʙa unvoni] ʙimdihanda nazdaton omad; pas, [holo ki itoat nakarded, ta'mi azoʙro] ʙicased, ki sitamgoron hec jorigare nadorand
